review: Love the Fire TV Stick.  Arrived on time, easy to install and use.  Already had Amazon Prime and Netflix Subscriptions.  Should have gotten this months ago.
author: Eva J Weston

review: I am having problems with movies. They can not be seen. There is a message error. That the movie is currently unnavalable.
author: Gustavo Tapia

review: It worked great until our power went out, no I can't seem to get it to work, actual stick seems really warm
author: bathunt

review: It's Apps aren't useful to me. Amazon Prime TV has very little I care to watch so Apple TV works better for me.
author: Chris Williams

review: Excellent for what I paidNeed more products like these that's useful and good price point
author: Nagesh G

review: I really like the fire stick. I also have Chromecast and like that too, but the Firestick has a nice home screen and remote to choose what I might want to watch at that time. I find myself using the Firestick most often, and Chromecast for stuff that's not currently on amazon. It was very easy to set up, just a few clicks, and had a lot of aps already installed. Very satisfied!
author: Scott M. Stergios "Scott Stergios"

review: We love it and it is so easy to use.
author: Dannysucich

review: works great, used mostly for "Prime" and "Sling TV"
author: Corliss Hyer
